entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 01:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -15.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
